actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, to insure that no State will be apportioned less than 80 per centum of its tax contribution to the Highway Trust Fund.

summary.text: Provides that every State will be apportioned at least 80 percent of its tax contribution of the preceding fiscal year to the Highway Trust Fund.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, to insure that no State will be apportioned less than 80 per centum of its tax contribution to the Highway Trust Fund.
